segments.text: well , I finished my last final today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: the end of all the hard work for my master's . what a nice feeling to get my degree !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you want to attend the convocation ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: certainly . After years of hard work , I wouldn't miss it . By the way , where can I find cap and gown ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you want to have them made or do you want to rent them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , I think they're provided by the school for that special day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: no . those you have to provide for yourself .

segments.text: what do most of the students do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , most of them only need a cap and gown for that particular convocation service , but some of the education majors have had them made , because they will be faculty members , and they'll need them f
segments.speaker: S1
